text:
[Narrator] Keeping your application
traffic secure by using public

and private certificates
is important, but this often

requires the complicated,
manual processes of purchasing,

uploading, and renewing
certificates.

AWS Certificate Manager helps
you provision, manage, and deploy

public and private SSL/TLS certificates
for use with AWS services,

as well as your internal
connected resources.

ACM removes many of the time
consuming and error prone steps
to obtain certificates.

With just a few clicks in the
AWS Management Console or a call

to ACMs APIs, certificates
can be created and then ACM can

help you deploy them for your
website or application.

There's no additional
charge for provisioning

public or private SSL/TLS certificates
when you use them with ACM Integrated

services, such as Elastic
Load Balancing and Amazon
API Gateway.

On top of all this, ACM can help
ensure you do not lose uptime

by automatically renewing
in use and DNS validated
ACM issued certificates.

Protect and secure your websites
and resources today with AWS
Certificate Manager.
